summary:
**Minecraft Movie Summary**

The "Minecraft Movie" is a coming American adventure comedy based on the popular video game. Directed by Jared Hess, it stars Jack Black, Jason Momoa, and others. Plans started in 2014 when game creator Markus Persson announced a partnership with Warner Bros. Pictures. After several changes in directors and writers, filming began in New Zealand in 2023 and wrapped up in April 2024. A teaser and title were released in September 2024. The movie is set to release in the United States on April 4, 2025.
title: A Minecraft Movie
